snippet: Shawn Johnson, a gold medalist at the 2008 Olympics, attended the national gymnastics championships this weekend, but only as a spectator. She retired from the sport last week.
abstract: Shawn Johnson, a gold medalist at the 2008 Olympics, attended the national gymnastics championships this weekend, but only as a spectator. She retired from the sport last week.

headline.main: A Fan at an Event She Once Dominated
